hero.title: Team Management
hero.desc: We are committed to providing the best group buying services for team members. Through precise product selection and efficient operations, we help every member get a better shopping experience.
hero.feature1Desc: Strictly screen quality products to ensure every item is worth more than its value
hero.feature2Desc: Professional operations team, quick response to member needs
hero.feature3Desc: Full tracking service to protect member rights

settings.title: Team Settings
settings.autoApproveDesc: When enabled, new members will be automatically approved

invite.title: Invite Members
invite.heroDesc: Share invitation link or code to invite friends to participate in group buying
invite.linkHint: Share this link with friends, they can join by clicking the link
invite.codeHint: Friends can join your team by entering this code when registering
invite.shareText: Come join my group buying team and enjoy discounts together!
invite.tip1: You will receive rewards when friends register through your invitation link and complete their first purchase
invite.tip2: The more friends you invite, the more rewards you get
invite.tip3: Rewards will be automatically credited to your account after friends complete their first purchase

customerService.title: Customer Service
customerService.welcome: Hello! I'm your support agent. How can I help you today?
customerService.userMsg1: I'd like to know about group-buy rules
customerService.response1: Sure! Let me explain the group-buy rules in detail...

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.faq1Q: How do I join a group buy?
helpCenter.faq1A: Click on the product you like, select specifications, and tap 'Join Group Buy'.
helpCenter.faq2Q: When will my group-buy order ship?
helpCenter.faq2A: Orders ship within 3-7 business days after the group buy succeeds.
helpCenter.faq3Q: How do I request a refund?
helpCenter.faq3A: Go to order details, tap 'Request Refund', and submit your reason.
helpCenter.faq4A: Tap the 'Support' button in the top-right corner to reach our team.

productDetail.title: Product Details
productDetail.defaultDescription: A carefully selected premium item, perfect for collection or personal use.
productDetail.rule1Desc: Auto-ships within 24hrs once minimum group size is reached.
productDetail.rule2Desc: Full refund if group expires without reaching minimum size.
productDetail.rule3Desc: Group price is final, cannot be combined with other offers.
productDetail.noComments: No reviews yet, be the first!

groupTypeDetail.subtitle: {type} for faster groups and better deals
groupTypeDetail.rule1Desc: {type} must form within 24 hours, or auto-refund
groupTypeDetail.rule3Desc: Ships within 72hrs after group forms, free SF Express
groupTypeDetail.rule4Desc: Larger groups get bigger discounts, up to 50% off
groupTypeDetail.advantage1Desc: Bulk purchasing power means better prices for everyone
groupTypeDetail.advantage2Desc: All items rigorously vetted, money-back guarantee
groupTypeDetail.advantage3Desc: Ships immediately after group forms, 72hr delivery
groupTypeDetail.faq1Answer: Auto-refund to your original payment method, usually 3-5 business days.
groupTypeDetail.faq2Answer: Absolutely! Share the link and enjoy group discounts together.
groupTypeDetail.faq3Answer: Yes, 7-day return policy. Item must be unused and in original condition.

campaign.defaultDescription: Curated quality products at unbeatable group prices!

campaign.highlight3Desc: Invite friends to save even more

campaign.notice2: Full refund if group fails, risk-free participation

joinGroup.title: Confirm Participation

createGroup.title: Start a Group
createGroup.typeDescription: Invite friends to join and save more
createGroup.publicGroupDesc: Others can search and join your group
createGroup.rule1: Leader pays first, ships together after group forms
createGroup.rule2: Auto-refund if group expires, 3-5 business days
createGroup.rule3: Leader gets extra points and coupon rewards
createGroup.rule4: No individual refunds after success, only full group
